ygData.subject: RE: Some Equipment Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Obsidian Bead Hoop: AC 2, INT +3, AGI +3, comon drop from Singe, named drake in Sol A. Tsin Suchiko 3th rank, Tunare. ... From: Tim Perkins
ygData.messageBody:
Obsidian Bead Hoop: AC 2, INT +3, AGI +3, comon drop from Singe, named drake
in Sol A.

Tsin Suchiko
3th rank, Tunare.


-----Original Message-----
From: Tim Perkins [mailto:tperkins@...]
Sent: Saturday, December 18, 1999 10:05 PM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Some Equipment Questions


From: "Tim Perkins" <tperkins@...>

Most of the high level monks I know including myself wear obsidian bead hoop
earrings from singe in Sol A they have AC and agil (dont remember the stats)
+ some int.

Kizmet Bayashi
Monk of the 46th previously 47th level (friggin POF is hard on exp)
E-Marr
